channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News

item.description: London's first ever Taiwan Festival art expo has begun, presenting contemporary artworks from over 30 Taiwanese artists.

item.title: Taipei Hosts Holocaust Memorial Event With Israeli, German Representatives
item.description: The Taiwan Foundation for Democracy has hosted a Holocaust remembrance event in Taipei attended by representatives from Israel and Germany. The event represents another of a series
